@Redfish.ActionInfo.description: The term can be applied to an Action to specify a URI to an ActionInfo resource which describes the parameters supported by this instance of the Action.

@Redfish.Settings.description: Reference to the resource that represents the settings to be applied to this object.

@Redfish.SettingsApplyTime.description: Configuration settings for when the values in the settings object are applied to a given resource.

@Redfish.OperationApplyTime.description: The requested apply time from a client when performing a Create, Delete, or Action operation.

@Redfish.OperationApplyTimeSupport.description: Indicates if a client is allowed to request for a specific apply time of a Create, Delete, or Action operation of a given resource via the OperationApplyTime term.

@Redfish.MaintenanceWindow.description: Maintenance window configuration of a resource for when to apply settings or operations.

@Redfish.CollectionCapabilities.description: Reference to the resource that represents the POST capabilities of a given collection.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@Redfish.Allow.description: The set of allowable values for a parameter or property.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@Redfish.Requi.description: The term specifies that a property is required to be specified in the body of a POST request to create the resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@Redfish.SetOn.description: The term specifies that a property can only be set when a client is creating a new instance of a resource via POST.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@Redfish.Optio.description: The term specifies that a property may be set when a client is creating a new instance of a resource via POST.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@Redfish.Updat.description: The term specifies that a property may be set by a client using PATCH after creating a new instance of a resource via POST.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@Message.Exten.description: The ExtendedInfo annotation can be applied to any object or property to provide additional information about the item.
